alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued November 01 at 2:37PM CDT until November 02 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Critical Fire Weather Conditions Are Expected Again Wednesday... .The Red Flag Warning for today (Tuesday November 1st) continues for Kit Carson and Yuma counties through 6pm MDT. For Wednesday November 2nd, the Fire Weather Watch along and south of Interstate 70 has been upgraded to a Red Flag Warning; north of Interstate 70 the Fire Weather Watch remains. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001, 002, 013, 014, 027, 028, 041, 042, 079, 080, 081, AND 254... * Affected Area...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 001 Cheyenne and Fire Weather Zone 002 Rawlins. In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 079 Dundy, Fire Weather Zone 080 Hitchcock and Fire Weather Zone 081 Red Willow. * Winds...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * Relative Humidity...Around 13 percent. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
